comments.text:
STR:
 1. Visit a long page, e.g.:
     http://www.gutenberg.org/files/11/11-h/11-h.htm
     http://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/11.txt.utf8
 2. Hold Ctrl, and spin your scrollwheel a few times to zoom out multiple "notches"

ACTUAL RESULTS: Frequently, your vertical scrollbar briefly jumps to the middle of the window.

EXPECTED RESULTS: Scrollbar remains attached to right side of window.
